Class TeacherApproval

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.TeacherApproval
public class TeacherApproval extends Object
Provides methods for teachers to approve or reject student excuses, retrieve enrollment and user information related to attendance.

  • Constructor Summary

    approveExcuse(int studentId, String courseName, String dateString, String reason, int teacherId)
    Approves a student's excuse for an absence on a specific date and course, updating or inserting the attendance record accordingly, and sends a notification to the student.

  • Method Details

    • getEnrollmentId

      public static int getEnrollmentId(int studentId, String courseName)
      Retrieves the enrollment ID for a student in a specific course.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      Returns:
      The enrollment ID if found, otherwise -1.

    • approveExcuse

      public static boolean approveExcuse(int studentId, String courseName, String dateString, String reason, int teacherId)
      Approves a student's excuse for an absence on a specific date and course, updating or inserting the attendance record accordingly, and sends a notification to the student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      dateString - The date of the absence in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd).
      reason - The reason for the excuse.
      teacherId - The ID of the approving teacher.
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful; false otherwise.

    • rejectExcuse

      public static boolean rejectExcuse(int studentId, String courseName, String dateString, int teacherId)
      Rejects a student's excuse for an absence on a specific date and course, updating or inserting the attendance record accordingly, and sends a notification to the student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      dateString - The date of the absence in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd).
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher rejecting the excuse.
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful; false otherwise.

    • isUserStudent

      public static boolean isUserStudent(int userId)
      Checks if a user is a student based on their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user has a student role, false otherwise.

    • getStudentIdByUserId

      public static int getStudentIdByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves the student ID associated with a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID.
      Returns:
      The student ID if found; -1 otherwise.

    • getTeacherIdByUserId

      public static int getTeacherIdByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves the teacher ID associated with a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      the teacher ID, or -1 if not found
